sentences.en: A fast pulse and restlessness are early signs of oxygen deprivation.
sentences.cn: 脉搏增快和烦躁是缺氧的早期征兆.

sentences.en: Caffeine and other stimulants cannot overcome the effects of severe sleep deprivation.
sentences.cn: 咖啡因和其它兴奋剂不能克服严重睡眠剥夺的影响.

sentences.en: Changing this could have an enormous impact on deprivation around the world.
sentences.cn: 改变这个现状将对世界范围内对妇女的剥夺产生巨大的影响.

sentences.en: Diagnosis of nephrogenic diabetes insipidus ( NDI ) was confirmed by water deprivation test.
sentences.cn: 此病例经限水及抗利尿激素注射,试验后,确定诊断为肾因性 尿崩症.

sentences.en: Hormon - dependent tumour may sometimes be controlled by the artificial administration or deprivation of hormons.
sentences.cn: 依赖激素的肿瘤有时可用人为的服用或去除激素的方法得到控制.

sentences.en: Many studies make it clear that sleep deprivation is dangerous.
sentences.cn: 多实验都证实了睡眠剥夺的危险.

sentences.en: Material deprivation brings out the worst and the best in people.
sentences.cn: 物质上的匮乏既有坏的一面也有好的一面.

sentences.en: Millions more suffer from serious sleep deprivation caused by long work hours.
sentences.cn: 还有数百万人由于工作时数长导致他们严重睡眠不足。

sentences.en: Or sleep deprivation could mask the positive cognitive effects.
sentences.cn: 或者睡眠不足可能也会掩盖积极的认知效果.

sentences.en: Psychoanalysts tend to regard both sadism and masochism as arising from childhood deprivation.
sentences.cn: 精神分析学家往往认为施虐狂和受虐狂都是由于儿时缺乏关爱造成的。

sentences.en: Sleep deprivation can result in mental disorders.
sentences.cn: 缺乏睡眠会引起精神紊乱。

sentences.en: Squamous metaplasia inbeinto infarction, inflammation, therapy, or androgen deprivation therapy.
sentences.cn: 鳞状上皮化生常见于梗死 、 炎症 、 放疗或抗雄激素治疗后.

sentences.en: The report has spotlighted real deprivation in the inner cities.
sentences.cn: 这篇报道披露了旧城区的贫困真相.

sentences.en: The report, called "Child Poverty and Deprivation in the UK", makes for depressing reading.
sentences.cn: 题为“英国儿童的贫困状况”的报告让人读起来心情沉重。

sentences.en: There comes upon me a sense of chill discouragement of dreary deprivation.
sentences.cn: 我一定会心灰意冷,怅然若有所失.

sentences.en: To be fair, this was a man suffering from severe sleep deprivation.
sentences.cn: 公平地讲, 这个男人正遭受着严重的睡眠不足.

trans.tran_en: the lack of something that you need in order to be healthy, comfortable, or happy
